member.name: T:Wd3eCore.Environment.Extensions.Features.IFeatureHash
member.summary: An implementation of this interface provide efficient access to the state of the enabled feature in order to provide hashes used for caching. Because its state should be cached, the instance should not have any state thus is declared as transient.

member.name: M:Wd3eCore.Environment.Extensions.Features.IFeatureHash.GetFeatureHashAsync
member.summary: Returns a serial number representing the list of available features for the current tenant.
member.returns: An value that changes every time the list of features changes. The implementation is efficient in order to be called frequently.

member.name: M:Wd3eCore.Environment.Extensions.Features.IFeatureHash.GetFeatureHashAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a serial number representing the list of available features for the current tenant.
member.returns: A value that changes every time a specific feature is enabled. The implementation is efficient in order to be called frequently.

member.name: M:Wd3eCore.Environment.Extensions.Utility.DependencyOrdering.OrderByDependenciesAndPriorities``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,``0,System.Boolean},System.Func{``0,System.Int32})
member.summary: Linearizes a dependency graph so that items are positioned after their dependencies. This by using a function which determines if an item has a direct dependency on another. Then, items are moved up whenever it is possible without breaking the dependency graph. This by using a function which gives for each item a priority used as an order value.

member.summary: Uses shell-specific database or other resources to return the current "correct" configuration. The host will use this information to reinitialize the shell.

Alters databased information to match information passed as arguments. Prior SerialNumber used for optimistic concurrency, and an exception should be thrown if the number in storage doesn't match what's provided.

member.name: T:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute
member.summary: Defines a Feature in a Module, can be used multiple times. If at least one Feature is defined, the Module default feature is ignored.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.Name
member.Summary: Human-readable name of the feature. If not provided, the identifier will be used.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.Description
member.Summary: A brief summary of what the feature does.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.Dependencies
member.Summary: A list of features that the feature depends on. So that its drivers / handlers are invoked after those of dependencies.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.Priority
member.Summary: The priority of the feature without breaking the dependencies order. higher is the priority, later the drivers / handlers are invoked.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.Category
member.Summary: The group (by category) that the feature belongs. If not provided, defaults to 'Uncategorized'.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.DefaultTenantOnly
member.summary: Set to true to only allow the Default tenant to enable / disable the feature.

member.name: P:Wd3eCore.Modules.Manifest.FeatureAttribute.IsAlwaysEnabled
member.summary: Once enabled, check whether the feature can't be disabled. Defaults to false.
